Html:
Has anyone succeeded in upgrading QuickGraph to .Net 4.0?  I see that the references to Microsoft.Contracts need to change, but I'm not sure what else.

Anyone already go down this road?

Contracts should be the only problem. I'll see if I can add a reference. Otherwize, I don't see anything that would be broken in QuickGraph so you should be able to use the assemblies compiled against 2.0.
